item.title: DSLs Are Terrible
item.description: Trigger warning: this is a silly rant I wrote a few years ago after raging at the Hugo blog engine for a couple hours. I think its funny and still relevant, so hyperbolic nonsense incoming! DSL’s (Domain Specific Languages) are often terrible. Each DSL is a special snowflake, delicately floating from the heavens straight into in your eye. The problem with a DSL is that it always starts so simple.
